gen:link.msg:message: `MaintenanceExpenses` SHOULD also be reported, because at least one of the underlying values of `MaintenanceExpenses` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfMaintenanceExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfMaintenanceExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_MaintenanceExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_MaintenanceExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`MaintenanceExpenses` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_MaintenanceExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_MaintenanceExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfMaintenanceExpensesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfMaintenanceExpensesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfMaintenanceExpensesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfMaintenanceExpensesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`MaintenanceExpenses` reported with `ClassesOfMaintenanceExpensesAxis` and `TotalMaintenanceActivitiesMember` SHOULD be equal to `MaintenanceExpenses` without `ClassesOfMaintenanceExpensesAxis` and TotalMaintenanceActivitiesMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfMaintenanceExpensesAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfMaintenanceExpensesAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfMaintenanceExpensesAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfMaintenanceExpensesAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`TotalMaintenanceActivitiesMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AedesBenchmarkConservationMaintenanceExpensesSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
